Name: Seven Seas Hotel Blue
Description: This large, beach hotel offers a range of facilities to suit most ages and consists of 357 rooms located in a main building and also in blocks within the spacious grounds. Located on Turkey's south coast, close to the ruins of the Hellenistic / Roman city in the resort of Side, the riverside town of Manavgat is just 4 km away. Public transport and taxis run from the hotel entrance providing easy access to the many sight-seeing attractions in the area, including the Temple of Apollo in Side village. (Some facilities may not be operational year round due to weather/seasonal conditions).

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
